summary.span: 定义有着相似的基本设计但在形式上有某些差异的一组字样。

span.span: Defines a group of type faces having a similar basic design and certain variations in styles.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了中的所有字体系列属性的类。The following code example shows all the font families in the property of the class. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. 若要运行此示例中，添加名为`listBox1`为窗体，并调用`PopulateListBoxWithFonts`从窗体的构造函数。To run this example, add a named `listBox1` to a form and call the `PopulateListBoxWithFonts` method from the form's constructor. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放此 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用允许使用的资源重新分配用于其他目的。Calling allows the resources used by this to be reallocated for other purposes. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *Em 方形*是一个版式术语，指的是字体的宽字符，通常以字母 M 所占据的矩形。*Em square* is a typography term that refers to the rectangle occupied by the font's widest letter, traditionally the letter M. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 。Creates a . - 获取该字体系列的 em 方形的高度。Gets the em square height for that font family. - 以文本形式绘制到屏幕的全身高度的值。Draws the value of the em height to the screen as text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指示非特定语言，您应指定为 0`language`参数。To indicate language neutral, you should specify 0 for the `language` parameter. 有关可用语言和子的列表，请参阅 Winnt.h 中的标头文件。For a listing of the available languages and sublanguages, see the Winnt.h header file. 如果已安装的 Visual Studio 时，此标头文件通常可相对于在 Visual Studio 安装目录\\\VC\PlatformSDK\Include。If you have Visual Studio installed, this header file can typically be found relative to the Visual Studio installation directory at \\\VC\PlatformSDK\Include. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 。Creates a . - 获取字体系列的名称。Gets the name of the font family. - 为文本绘制到屏幕的字体系列名称。Draws the name of the font family to the screen as text.
